text: hi, any way to share css hubl variables accross diferent stylesheets?

Something I've done is emulate the way a "_settings.scss" file would work, where you declare all of your settings variables in one stylesheet, then use "import" to share them across different files. Check out the documentation here. They use it for macros, but you could just as easily use it as a variable reference: <http://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-variables-and-macros-syntax>
